Changelog
=========

1.1
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

* Change ReoAko icon used in Draftail toolbar from SVG path to an SVG icon file added via a Wagtail Hook
* Updating public PyPI README with better instructions.
* Add Developer README for easier ongoing maintenance
* Add provisioning system for scaffolding a VM for easier ongoing maintenance and testing.
* Reimplement "browse" functionality in Modal Workflow JavaScript to move away from in-built Page specific PAGE_CHOOSER_MODAL_ON_LOAD_HANDLER
* Add backward compatibility imports
* Add helper scripts to manipulate dev VM and allow easy changing of Wagtail and Django versions for testing.
